description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 4 iterations of the function f(x) = 9x + 8.
comments: n, 9*n+8, 81*n+80, 729*n+728 and 6561*n+6560 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..5000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(9*n+8) and IsPrime(81*n+80) and IsPrime(729*n+728) and IsPrime(6561*n+6560)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
